packs.name: Back to School Collection
packs.description: A variety of educational icons perfect for school-related design projects, including textbooks, pencils, and classroom symbols.

packs.name: Higher Education Set
packs.description: Icons representing higher education, featuring graduation caps, diplomas, universities, and online courses.

packs.name: Educational Technology
packs.description: Modern education icons showcasing e-learning, online classes, and digital education tools.

packs.name: Elementary School Icons
packs.description: A playful collection of icons suitable for children's education apps and websites, with bright, colorful depictions of school supplies and activities.

packs.name: Academic Disciplines
packs.description: A broad range of icons covering various academic subjects such as science, mathematics, literature, and history.
